QUERY.TITLE: Labour after John Smith
QUERY.DESC: What was the effect on Britain ' s Labour_Party of the death of John Smith ?
QUERY.NARR: Documents should discuss or speculate on the future of the_British Labour_Party after the death of its leader John Smith in 1994 . Of particular interest are details on the struggle for power between the various currents in the party and the battle between the candidates for leadership .
